semantic_title: Assigning and Sequencing Secondary Diabetes Codes and Their Causes
section_path: Section I > C. Chapter-Specific Coding Guidelines > 4. Chapter 4: Endocrine, Nutritional and Metabolic Diseases > a. Diabetes mellitus > 4. Assigning and sequencing secondary diabetes codes and its causes

content.full_text: The sequencing of the secondary diabetes codes in relationship to codes for the cause of the diabetes is based on the Tabular List instructions for categories E08, E09 and E13. (Evidence: pg no: 42, L6-L7)
content.summary: Provides guidance on how to sequence secondary diabetes codes in relation to their underlying causes based on tabular list instructions (Evidence: pg no: 42, L6-L7)
key_concepts: Secondary diabetes sequencing (Evidence: pg no: 42, L6)
Tabular List instructions priority (Evidence: pg no: 42, L6-L7)
Categories E08, E09, E13 relationships (Evidence: pg no: 42, L7)

detailed_rules.rule_text: Sequencing must follow Tabular List instructions for categories E08, E09 and E13 (Evidence: pg no: 42, L6-L7)
detailed_rules.explanation: The order of codes for secondary diabetes and its causes is determined by specific instructions in the tabular list rather than general sequencing rules (Evidence: pg no: 42, L6-L7)

workflow_steps: Step 3: Consult Tabular List instructions for E08, E09, E13
Step 4: Sequence codes according to tabular instructions

code_ranges.description: Diabetes mellitus due to underlying condition (Evidence: pg no: 42, L7)
usage_rules: Sequence according to tabular instructions (Evidence: pg no: 42, L6-L7)

code_ranges.description: Drug or chemical induced diabetes mellitus (Evidence: pg no: 42, L7)
usage_rules: Sequence according to tabular instructions (Evidence: pg no: 42, L6-L7)

code_ranges.description: Other specified diabetes mellitus (Evidence: pg no: 42, L7)
usage_rules: Sequence according to tabular instructions (Evidence: pg no: 42, L6-L7)

warnings: Must follow tabular list instructions rather than general sequencing rules (Evidence: pg no: 42, L6-L7)
best_practices: Always consult tabular list for E08, E09, E13 sequencing (Evidence: pg no: 42, L6-L7)
